PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2006-04032006-05-18,  ,  EC,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Assessment Act
PrecisEnactment of the CROWN CORPORATIONS INVOLVED IN THE PROVISION OF COMMERCIAL LOANS ENVIRONMENTAL ASSESSMENT REGULATIONS which establish a modified environmental assessment process that would apply to two Crown corporations (Business Development Bank of Canada and Farm Credit Canada) involved in the making of commercial loans , effective June 11, 2006.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2006-0104 Publication Date: 2006-05-31
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Enactment of the CROWN CORPORATIONS INVOLVED IN THE PROVISION OF COMMERCIAL LOANS ENVIRONMENTAL ASSESSMENT REGULATIONS which establish a modified environmental assessment process that would apply to two Crown corporations (Business Development Bank of Canada and Farm Credit Canada) involved in the making of commercial loans , effective June 11, 2006.
